Html:
wondering if anyone has experience with using ILMerge to create one assembly for PRISM reference dll

and if you encountered any issues ?

Hi,

So far we haven't run any tests with this utility and Prism. Based on my understanding ILmerge doesn’t support WPF applications, because of the way XAML is compiled, so it could be possible that you might find some issues when using it with Prism applications.

You can find more information in the ILMerge website.

Regards,

Agustin Adami
http://blogs.southworks.net/aadami
